content.question: If <math alttext="f of x equals, the sine of, open parenthesis, e raised to the 3 x power, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="2.4ex" width="0.0em"></mspace><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, then <math alttext="f prime of x equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>
